name: pCrop: Photo Resizer and Compress
description: pCrop: Photo Resizer and Compress helps you quickly reduce your picture size or resolution. Easy to optimize your images without losing quality and file size.  ** Compress Images  Image Compressor - Very good quality of the compressed photos and optional compress quality - Give you best analysis of before compress and after compress image size - Output Result saved in /CompressedImages  ** Resize Images  Photo Resizer - Very good quality of the resized photos - Resize mode by pixel or quality with maintain resolution - File option offers to save images as JPG, PNG, WEBP or default format - Output Result saved in /ResizedImages  ** Crop Photo - Use the crop tool to remove unwanted portions of the photo - Simple photo crop tool and easy to crop and rotate images. - Free style cropping with rotate feature (Vertically and horizontally) - Output Result saved in /CroppedImages  **pCrop: Photo Resizer and Compress offers very useful features : - Use finger to zoom/move, rotate the crop area on the photo - Very good quality of the compressed photos and optional compress quality - Rotate Images by 90 either clockwise or (Vertically and horizontally) and crop the photo - Photo Compressor, Image Compressor, Image Resizer, Reduce photo size and compress image size - Multi photo resizer, Image crop and resize, free style cropping tool - View generated images in My Creation option under three folders (CompressedImages, ResizedImages and CroppedImages) - Easy to share compressed and resized images or delete unwanted photos too
